subject: HBO T-Shirts Now Available
event:
HBO has opened an on-line shop for GAME OF THRONES merchandise.

Their first offerings are a couple of T-shirts featuring logo art from the series.

Oh, and you can also buy copies of the books that started the whole thing, by some guy.

Check it out and place your orders at

http://store.hbo.com/?v=hbo_shows_game-of-thrones

comments.article: Not really: the men's shirts are pre-orders expected to ship on 12/31 and the women's are listed as being sold out :(
it says all the women's shirts are already sold out. *sulks*
Boy, that was fast.

On both women's tees:

Availability: Currently Sold Out

Bahhhh! (Humbug)

Oh well, guess I'll be waiting for the next shipment.
I just asked for the Winter is Coming shirt for Christmas. Very nice!

No men's smalls available, alas.
That's a lost sale from me. :(
Not in time for Christmas at all!  :(  The woman's tee isn't available until Dec 31.  Boo.  :( :( :(

Oops/ Didn't realize. Sorry.

(I've got to post this stuff faster, I guess).
Only thing is that several of the sizes seem to say they won't be available until January, which sucks as I was hoping to get Josh one for Christmas. :/

Oh yeah! I heard the show was based on some books...

who was it that wrote them?
I dunno...The Grim Arden or something that sounds like that.  You mean there's going to be a show about the Wrongs of Rice and Tire?
Christmas is coming.......
comments.subject: Christmas

comments.article:
dammit!! I'm trying to save money!!


*off to buy a shirt*
Getting a shirt for sure... Love you man, have a wonderful holiday...
comments.subject: Awesome...

comments.article: Interestingly, the copy of GAME OF THRONES listed seems to be the new TV tie-in edition, due out in March :-)
$16.00 for A Game of Thrones?  Seriously?  Is there something special about this edition?  Also, I love how the description calls it the first in a trilogy.  Ha!

Will the t-shirts be available to buy for UK fans?  I remember from the Rome merchandise that I couldn't order anything from HBO because they didn't ship overseas and had to go hunting on Ebay - I did manage to get one of the items I wanted but I was sadly disappointed over others.  I'm guessing they still won't ship overseas.
comments.subject: t-shirts

comments.article: Just out of interest, does HBO get some sort of royalties from the books that are specifically marketed as series tie-in, with a cover related to the series?
no
NAB: one-stop shopping with something for everyone. Thanks!
*Ponders how long it'll be before HBO teams up with Valyrian Steel to offer the swords via their site.*

Winter-Is-Coming.Net also posted a link to the HBO Shop. I have already pre-ordered my t-shirt...I like the one with the raven so that is the one I got! I can't wait to get it once it ships out on Dec. 31/'10. It does take longer until it reaches Canada, but hey it's well worth the time. Besides one cannot just talk about supporting the ASOIF books and the HBO series, one has to do it! This is my small bit (I have already purchased all the books available)!

I hope more items become available in due time, I am definitely not adverse in purchasing more stuff (the DVD/Blue-Ray of the first season included...LOL)

Now if only HBO would make its decision to greenlight the second season...I'll keep my fingers crossed!
comments.subject: Awaiting for Winter-Is-Coming to ship out!

comments.article: will hbo be producing swords from the show?  Thanks.
comments.subject: hbo swords

comments.article: Valyrian Steel holds that license.
comments.subject: Re: hbo swords

comments.article: Thanks...2 Winter Is Coming Tee's ordered...looks like there will be a Dec 31st shipping event.
Hearing that makes me dream of those sweet and super unavailable shirts on your website.
comments.subject: Game of Throne T shirts!

comments.article: No 3XL shirts?

No 3XL shirts? That is disappointing.

comments.subject: HBO shirts

comments.article: Just wanted to let you know my husband loves your books.  He is anxiously awaiting the next in line after A Feast for Crows.
comments.subject: Thanks!

comments.article:
Any chance us Europeans can order these shirts from somewhere? George, maybe you could sell some through your website?

Panos
comments.subject: Europe?

comments.article: Or via Ebay.  I would really love a t-shirt.  :-)  I've wanted this show to happen for about 10 years so a t-shirt would be the icing on the cake.  Funnily enough I wanted Sean Bean to play Ned back then - I got my wish!
comments.subject: Re: Europe?
